name: Striker
text: [Activate: Main] (2) (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area): You may rest this Stage: If your Leader is [Portgaz D. Ace], look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: If your Leader is [Portgaz D. Ace], look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 Event card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
